languages.text: "Как тут тихо... неужели во вселенной нашлось место, где мои болтливые друзья умолкли? Что, ни одной трагедии в прошлом, ни единого бедствия в будущем?"

traits.locale_text: "Как тут тихо... неужели во вселенной нашлось место, где мои болтливые друзья умолкли? Что, ни одной трагедии в прошлом, ни единого бедствия в будущем?"

languages.text: "It's so quiet... Is it possible? Have I found the one place in the universe where my chatty friends have nothing to say? What, not one tragedy in the past? Not a single calamity in the future?"
languages.original_text: "Как тут тихо... неужели во вселенной нашлось место, где мои болтливые друзья умолкли? Что, ни одной трагедии в прошлом, ни единого бедствия в будущем?"

traits.locale_text: "It's so quiet... Is it possible? Have I found the one place in the universe where my chatty friends have nothing to say? What, not one tragedy in the past? Not a single calamity in the future?"
"It's so quiet... Is it possible? Have I found the one place in the universe where my chatty friends have nothing to say? What, not one tragedy in the past? Not a single calamity in the future?"
"It's so quiet... Is it possible? Have I found the one place in the universe where my chatty friends have nothing to say? What, not one tragedy in the past? Not a single calamity in the future?"
"It's so quiet... Is it possible? Have I found the one place in the universe where my chatty friends have nothing to say? What, not one tragedy in the past? Not a single calamity in the future?"

languages.text: « Quel silence... Serait-ce possible ? Aurais-je trouvé le seul endroit de l'univers qui laisse sans voix mes compagnons d'ordinaire si bavards ? Vraiment ? Pas de tragédie à faire ressurgir du passé ? Pas de calamité à prévoir dans l'avenir ? »
languages.original_text: "It's so quiet... Is it possible? Have I found the one place in the universe where my chatty friends have nothing to say? What, not one tragedy in the past? Not a single calamity in the future?"

traits.locale_text: « Quel silence... Serait-ce possible ? Aurais-je trouvé le seul endroit de l'univers qui laisse sans voix mes compagnons d'ordinaire si bavards ? Vraiment ? Pas de tragédie à faire ressurgir du passé ? Pas de calamité à prévoir dans l'avenir ? »

languages.text: “这里好安静……怎么回事？难道这是整个宇宙唯一一个让我那些聒噪的小朋友无话可说的地方？怎么？这里过去不曾发生过任何悲剧？未来也不会有任何灾难吗？”
languages.original_text: "It's so quiet... Is it possible? Have I found the one place in the universe where my chatty friends have nothing to say? What, not one tragedy in the past? Not a single calamity in the future?"

traits.locale_text: “这里好安静……怎么回事？难道这是整个宇宙唯一一个让我那些聒噪的小朋友无话可说的地方？怎么？这里过去不曾发生过任何悲剧？未来也不会有任何灾难吗？”

languages.text: 「とても静かだ…こんな事があり得るの？この宇宙で、おしゃべりな友人たちが何も話すことがない場所を、私は見つけてしまったのかしら？過去に悲劇がひとつもない？未来に災難は一つもないの？」
languages.original_text: "It's so quiet... Is it possible? Have I found the one place in the universe where my chatty friends have nothing to say? What, not one tragedy in the past? Not a single calamity in the future?"

traits.locale_text: 「とても静かだ…こんな事があり得るの？この宇宙で、おしゃべりな友人たちが何も話すことがない場所を、私は見つけてしまったのかしら？過去に悲劇がひとつもない？未来に災難は一つもないの？」

languages.text: "Es ist so still ... Ist das möglich? Habe ich den einzigen Ort im Universum gefunden, an dem meine redseligen Freunde nichts zu sagen haben? Was, gab es in der Vergangenheit keine einzige Tragödie? Wartet in der Zukunft kein einziges Desaster?"
languages.original_text: "It's so quiet... Is it possible? Have I found the one place in the universe where my chatty friends have nothing to say? What, not one tragedy in the past? Not a single calamity in the future?"

traits.locale_text: "Es ist so still ... Ist das möglich? Habe ich den einzigen Ort im Universum gefunden, an dem meine redseligen Freunde nichts zu sagen haben? Was, gab es in der Vergangenheit keine einzige Tragödie? Wartet in der Zukunft kein einziges Desaster?"

languages.text: «Qué silencio... ¿Cómo es posible? ¿Acaso he encontrado el único lugar donde mis parlanchines amigos no tienen nada que decir? Qué pasa, ¿no hay ninguna tragedia en el pasado? ¿No se avecina ninguna hecatombe?».
languages.original_text: "It's so quiet... Is it possible? Have I found the one place in the universe where my chatty friends have nothing to say? What, not one tragedy in the past? Not a single calamity in the future?"

traits.locale_text: «Qué silencio... ¿Cómo es posible? ¿Acaso he encontrado el único lugar donde mis parlanchines amigos no tienen nada que decir? Qué pasa, ¿no hay ninguna tragedia en el pasado? ¿No se avecina ninguna hecatombe?».

languages.text: "Ne kadar sessiz... Bu mümkün mü? Geveze dostlarımın hakkında söyleyecek tek bir şeyi dahi olmayan bir yer mi bulduk? Ne, geçmişte tek bir trajedi bile yaşanmamış mı? Geleceğinde tek bir felaket dahi yok mu?"
languages.original_text: "It's so quiet... Is it possible? Have I found the one place in the universe where my chatty friends have nothing to say? What, not one tragedy in the past? Not a single calamity in the future?"
